articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Prince Harry, Meghan Markle blindside queen, step back from royal family
articles.description: Not only the public was stunned by Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's announcement that they are taking a "step back" from being senior British royals. According to NBC's Keir Simmons, the royal family only had ten minutes notice themselves.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Tulsi Gabbard on conflict with Iran: 'We've got to choose diplomacy'
articles.description: 2020 presidential candidate Rep. Tulsi Gabbard, D-Hawaii, spoke to Katy Tur about U.S. involvement with Iraq and Iran. She said the U.S. should only involve itself when there is an "imminent and direct threat against American forces."

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Katy Tur breaks down the latest developments in the impeachment inquiry
articles.description: On Day 108 of the impeachment inquiry, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi said she will send the articles of impeachment to the Senate "when I'm ready" and Senate Democrats push to end the impeachment trial delay.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Sen. Van Hollen: Trump's maximum pressure campaign 'brought us...
articles.description: Senator Chris Van Hollen (D-MD) joins Andrea Mitchell in the wake of new revelations that US sources say that the Ukrainian plane was shot down by Iranian missiles, a situation he calls a 'humanitarian crisis' that should allow for exceptions to Trump's propo…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: GOP Senators criticize administration over Iran briefing
articles.description: Jeremy Bash and Tom Donilon, two former officials with experience briefing Congress on classified matters, join Andrea Mitchell to discuss the administration's Congressional briefing on Iran that has drawn criticism from members of Trump's own party.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Rep. Gallagher: 'White House certainly had the authority to act' against Soleimani
articles.description: Rep. Mike Gallagher (R-WI), an Iraq war vet, pushes back against his Senate colleague Mike Lee's (R-UT) criticism of the Trump administration's briefing to Congress on the situation with Iran, including the justification for taking out Soleimani, telling Andr…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Voting machine vendors testify in election security hearing
articles.description: The CEOs of three voting machine vendors testified before the House Administration Committee for a hearing on election security. NBC News' Ben Popken reports from Capitol Hill.
